_header: One God I bid thee worship ay swear not in vain
Note:
For later versions in printed Horae see Bühler (1959)
XBühler, Kurt. “‘At thy golg first eut of the house vlysse the saynge thus.’” Studies in the Renaissance 6 (1959): 223-35, 228-9.

BLRoy8Fvii.First Lines:
On god I byde þe worchype ay & swer noght in weynI þe
                    say þu halyday lok þu kepe…
BLRoy8Fvii.Last Lines:
…Thy neyhboures wyfe þu couet noghtNeyther oþer
                    þing þat god wrought
